title: Reset Layout
author: robgnet
body_snippet:
Each time I open mRemoteNG and open a SSH window, I have to Reset Layout otherwise the screen is boxed in a small square. I have the program open full screen.

Windows 7, 64bit Service Pack 1
mRemoteNG v1.75.7012.16814

iterations.description: The report describes a clear user-facing bug where newly opened SSH sessions are not sized to the panel until a manual minimize/maximize triggers layout.

comments.author: morganweb
comments.snippet:
I can confirm this is an issue. Upon opening any SSH connection I need to minimise then maximise the mRemoteNG window in order to make the content fit the right hand panel.

Show in this screenshot.

![mremoteng 2018-03-07_115338](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/37144052/37091113-dff5799c-21fe-11e8-9838-c4b5c760ff55.png)

notes:
AI triage (codex): The report describes a clear user-facing bug where newly opened SSH sessions are not sized to the panel until a manual minimize/maximize triggers layout.
Approach: Ensure SSH tab host controls get a guaranteed post-open resize/layout pass and add a regression test for initial SSH content fit.
